file_content.text: [Using the security console triggers a holorecording dated several days past.]
What--who are you? Who let you in here?
Nobody let us in. I'm afraid this isn't your day, Captain. I'm taking over.
Your guards are dead. I'm in charge now. Now I'm going to give you a choice, and how you respond will determine whether you live or whether you die.
The choice is this--give up your weapons, in which case you will live and I will ransom you back to your superiors... or refuse my instructions and die.
[The console controls access to the cells. The prisoners can be released from here. Anyone left in the cells will likely die of exposure with the guards gone.]
There's no reason to send enemy soldiers back to the battle.
Nobody deserves to be treated this way.
